info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.marketplace.xc_saas

post.description: Use this API to signup registered Azure Service Bus (ASB) provisioning message for F5XC service.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

get.description: Use this API to to get registration details (currently limited to email address and domain) associated with a specific asb_message object

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

post.description: Use this API to send a tenant provisioning signup email when the signup URL link in the previously sent email has expired or is no longer accessible

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

xc_saasGetRegistrationDetailsResponse.description: Response format for returning registration details associated with the ASB message
xc_saasGetRegistrationDetailsResponse.title: GetRegistrationDetailsResponse

console_url.description:
A URL to the console page, returned if the tenant is already signed up and active

Example: ` "console_urlhttps://console.ves.volterra.io/login/start"`
console_url.title: console_url

domain.description: The domain associated with the registered ASB message
domain.title: domain

email.description: The email associated with the registered ASB message
email.title: email

error_message.description:
An error message providing additional details (e.g., tenant already signed up)

Example: ` "error_message""Your account is already active. Please log in to continue."`
error_message.title: error_message
error_message.x-ves-example: error_message": "Your account is already active. Please log in to continue.

xc_saasSendEmailResponse.description: Response to indicate if the email was sent successfully
xc_saasSendEmailResponse.title: SendEmailResponse

message.description: Message provides additional context regarding the result of the email send operation
message.title: message

success.description: Indicates if the email was sent successfully
success.title: success

domain.description:
The domain associated with the tenant/account

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 17
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 1
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.not_in: [\"ves\",\"volterra\",\"f5\"]
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ves_object_name: true
domain.title: domain
